Publication Title: Establishment of a tissue-engineered colon cancer model for comparative analysis of cancer cell lines
Publication Keywords: Colorectal Cancer, Ht-29, Hct 116, Sw480, Peg-fibrinogen, Cancer Tissue Engineering
Publication Authors: Iman Hassani, Benjamin Anbiah, Andrew L Moore, Peter T Abraham, Ifeoluwa A Odeniyi, Nicole L Habbit, Michael W Greene, Elizabeth A Lipke
Publication Abstract: To overcome the limitations of in vitro two-dimensional (2D) cancer models in mimicking the complexities of the native tumor milieu, three-dimensional (3D) engineered cancer models using biomimetic materials have been introduced to more closely recapitulate the key attributes of the tumor microenvironment.
